summary: OwnerPhoto now defaults to a Founder Dilkhush image path and alt text, with the existing on-error fallback preserved. However, the diff does not show the required founder image files being added under frontend/public/assets/ with the specified filenames, and the referenced paths point to /assets/generated/ rather than /assets/ as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: A square, web-optimized founder photo file exists under frontend/public/assets/ using the generated filename(s) from the build request.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only a new config module referencing '/assets/generated/founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg' and '/assets/generated/founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg', but does not show any image assets being added under frontend/public/assets/ (or anywhere in frontend/public).

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the generated founder photo asset from frontend/public/assets/ in the app (public-path URL from /assets/...).
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented public-path URLs reference '/assets/generated/...', whereas the requirement explicitly specifies assets under frontend/public/assets/ (i.e., '/assets/...'). The diff does not show the assets placed under that directory or the paths updated accordingly.
